sentence.Network_en: Even I boggle at the idea of spending so much money.
sentence.Network_cn: 一想到要花这么多钱，连我都有点犹豫。

sentence.Network_en: The good grace with which they face the latest privations makes the mind boggle.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们面对最近的贫困所表现出的坦然令人难以理解。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 求WOW命令大全~_爱问知识人 ... /Brb( 即回) /Boggle( 犹豫) /Bow( 鞠躬).
犹豫, 不知是否应 boggle [5bR^(E)l] vi. -gled, -gling 畏缩不前;犹豫 What an impossible job! The mind boggles. 这件事太难了!我无法想象怎么动手.

Megamind&nbsp;&nbsp;超级大坏蛋&nbsp;... ... Wow. That's a lot to take in. 还真要好好研究一番 It boggles my mind. 我很疑惑.
i mean , truly , the mind boggles ., 我是说 , 真的 , 无限想像的空间.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: probably of dialect origin and related to bogleand bogey

entry.tran: （思想）困惑；使无法想象；使难以理解
entry.def: If you say that the mind boggles at something or that something boggles the mind, you mean that it is so strange or amazing that it is difficult to imagine or understand.

example.ex: The mind boggles at the possibilities that could be in store for us...
example.tran: 我们简直无法想象将来面临的种种可能性。

example.ex: The good grace with which they face the latest privations makes the mind boggle...
example.tran: 他们面对最近的贫困所表现出的坦然令人难以理解。

means.word_mean: 2. hesitate when confronted with a problem, or when in doubt or fear

auth_sentence.content: We'll encounter new forces, new particles, and many other things that will boggle our brains.
auth_sentence.res_content: We'll encounter new forces, new particles, and many other things that will boggle our brains.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We'll encounter new forces, new particles, and many other things that will boggle our brains.

auth_sentence.content: When Las Vegas will display even more technology designed to boggle the mind and change the way people interact with the world.
auth_sentence.res_content: When Las Vegas will display even more technology designed to boggle the mind and change the way people interact with the world.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When Las Vegas will display even more technology designed to boggle the mind and change the way people interact with the world.

sentences.en: He boggled at the thought of swimming in winter.
sentences.cn: 他想到要在冬天游泳就有些犹豫。
